ygData.subject: Re: quest question
ygData.msgSnippet: ummm,, does it work on murissa sandwhisper ,, she KOS s me sometimes ,, sometimes she don t ,, I just want to buy water without having to run to freeport ,,,
ygData.messageBody:
ummm,, does it work on murissa sandwhisper ,,
she KOS's me sometimes ,, sometimes she don't ,, I just want to buy water
without having to run to freeport ,,,
----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 17, 1999 2:21 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] quest question


> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> i heard it only brings your con up one level, i.e. threatening to dubious.
> so KOS would only go to threatening i think, which means they will still
> attack.
>
> Shada
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Schafer, Timothy L 1425 [mailto:Timothy.Schafer@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, June 17, 1999 11:38 AM
> > To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] quest question
> >
> >
> > From: "Schafer, Timothy L 1425" <Timothy.Schafer@...>
> >
> > Does this song work on NPC's who usually KOS you? If you
> > click on them from
> > a safe distance and fire up the song, will he kill you when
> > you approach?
> >
> > Also is this song Party effect?
> >
> > Thanks,
> >
> > Wenaddar
> >
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: John Robertson [SMTP:johnr@...]
> > > Sent: Thursday, June 17, 1999 2:39 PM
> > > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > > Subject: Re: [eqbards] quest question
> > >
> > > From: "John Robertson" <johnr@...>
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > > Eric Chudej wrote:
> > >
> > > > From: "Eric Chudej" <Chudej@...>
> > > >
> > > > does anyone know if we can do the freeport corrupt guard
> > quest with the
> > > > charismatic carillion song???
> > > >
> > > > if so is it worth doing???
> > >
> > > Assuming we don't get instantly killed before we sing the
> > carillion son, I
> > > think we can do pretty much any quest now. I have done the
> > Sentry Xyrinn
> > > quest with it, and it's related to the corrupt guard one,
> > so I'm pretty
> > > sure
> > > you could.
> > >
> > > As to whether it's worth it, I can't say. I've heard it's
> > a good quest
> > > though.
> > >
> > > Jyzan
> > >
> > >
> > >
